meanings.definition: The quality or state of being hip or fashionable.
meanings.sent1: Her outfit exuded hipnesses at the party.
meanings.sent2: The store's decor reflected the latest hipnesses in design.
meanings.sent3: The catwalk model strutted with such hipnesses that even the audience was impressed.
meanings.sent4: His confidence and style gave off an aura of hipnesses that was hard to ignore.
meanings.sent5: The magazine cover showcased the epitome of hipnesses with its trendy layout and colors.

meanings.definition: The act of being aware or knowledgeable about current trends or culture.
meanings.sent1: His hipnesses about music made him the go-to person for recommendations.
meanings.sent2: She prided herself on her hipnesses of the latest movies and TV shows.
meanings.sent3: The professor's unexpected hipnesses about memes surprised the entire class.
meanings.sent4: Her ability to predict fashion trends showed her deep hipnesses of the industry.
meanings.sent5: The tour guide's hipnesses of local history made the sightseeing experience even more enjoyable.
